name: Max Louis Creative
slogan: Creative development in Shoreditch, delivering to the world

team.title: Operations Manager
team.name: Max Louis
team.bioHtml: Oleso managing director. Turning the social media marketing industry on its head, in high volumes, for SMEs.

team.name: Trevyn Stegall
team.bioHtml: Sound designer, audio engineer, awesome dude. Currently audio engineer at the Country Music Hall of Fame in Nashville, TN. Freelance at Max Louis Creative.

jobs.title: Sales Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a motivated and experienced individual to take on the role of the sales manager at our shiny new social media company (https://oleso.co)! Your main tasks would involve finding potential leads, delivering customer insight and representing the brand. This is a rewarding and exciting job role which would suit someone who is comfortable working autonomously. You’ll be working in the fast-paced and young environment of a tech startup, with the flexibility of working from home as well as the office in Shoreditch, London.

Job responsibilities:

 - Contributing and building a sales strategy
 - Identifying and qualifying leads
 - Achieving growth and exceeding sales targets
 - Representing Oleso
 - Developing and closing deals
 - Delivering customer insight
 - Communicating with potential clients via email, telephone and social media platforms
 - Creating and utilising sales funnels




Read more here: https://maxlouiscreative.com/jobs/sales-manager-full-time/
